entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
